VoiceList.Entry: Tifa “You must find the answer yourself.”
Tifa “Take your time,Cloud. Slowly…little by little,OK?”
“You mean that member of SOLDIER who came with Sephiroth wasn't…Cloud?”
“That starry night at the well… and our promises…What if the memory was all just a lie?”
Tifa “Don't hurry,Cloud… Don't answer too quickly.”
Tifa “Just keep checking all those small emotions and it'll come back… Slowly…little by little…”
Tifa “Right…like the sky that night… the heavens were filled with stars…”
“Tender feelings… that no one can ever know…”
